comment: Professor Tuschling is great! One of my favorite professors that I have taken.

Great class statecraft is a group assignment which wil take up majority of the class it's basically a big game of civilization(the video game). Gives lots of extra credit. Reading is recommended not really mandatory. You can choose your grading scale. Overall easy fun class 10/10 would take again.

Prof. Tuschling was bomb, wish I could take her again. The reading quizzes were hard and the Statecraft simulation we had to do definitely took work for everyone but it was all good in the end. Attendance required. Students can choose weights of hw/tests/participation. Overall a reasonable class structure and a super cool teacher :) love u lina
